root.name: Undercover Cops
root.description: CHARACTERSMatt Gables: An ex-football player who became a cop after being cleared of a murder accusation. He is the most powerful, but slowest character.Zan Takahara: A Japanese karateka and well-rounded character.Rosa Felmonde: The token female, she is the fastest character. She became a policewoman after her lover was murdered.WIP
